quote: In 2024, year to date, she has made $60,000 in commissions, directly through social media.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the financial impact of effective video marketing, capturing attention with a concrete success story.
suggested_hook: Want to make $60,000 from social media? Here's how one agent did it!

quote: Someone I hadn't seen in 10 years reached out to me... They want to buy a house with me.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates the power of staying top of mind through video, appealing to agents' desire for long-term client relationships.
suggested_hook: Reconnect with clients you thought were lost forever!
